page.title: 14Law and Order.(2)
page.content: Today ther is a lot of crimes.There are lots of men who go around assalting young women and children. Many of are criminals are caught thanks to our policemen and women.It all depends on the crime that the person does for how long they go to prison.If some one is under 17 there photo and identification will be taken.If their crime is bad they may be put in a home. The Conference Room is where they have private disscussions about serious crimes or criminal.It has a long table in with chairs either side. The police station in N.Shields Tyne and Wear is the 5th biggest and the 2nd biggest in N.Tyneside.It has 350 thousand police men in this area.It has 6 division upto Scotland,Ashington ,Berwick,South Shields and Jarrow. by Agnes Reynolds
